keyMoments.title: Used to Deliver Final Blow to Enel
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses his rubber body enhanced by the golden ball to deliver the decisive blow that strikes the Golden Bell and defeats Enel.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the strategic advantage of rubber against Enel's lightning powers in the climactic moment.

keyMoments.title: Used to Restart Ark Maxim
keyMoments.description: After recovering from his defeat, Enel uses his lightning powers to restart the Ark Maxim and power his journey to the moon.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even in defeat, Enel's devil fruit powers remain formidable and enable his escape to space.
